reviewsJson.markdown:
Setup: SXK Hadaly clone, 22ga ss316l 10-wrap, Cellucotton wicking

Testing: Inawera Red for Pipe @ 1.5% 70/30 1.5mg

Flavor Description: Inhale is red sweetness, exhale is leafy cherry pipe tobacco. It makes me think of if Dark for Pipe had some cherry/fruity sweetness to it. Fairly one-dimensional flavor, but very good.

Off-flavors: None

throat hit: 3/10

Second Opinions: none that i could find on here.
reviewsJson.author: [deleted]
reviewsJson.title: Red for Pipe
